All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ApiClientFactory
The ApiClientFactory class provides a factory for creating and accessing Retrofit API clients for different API endpoints.
Comment
 
CommentAdapter
CommentAdapter manages and displays a list of comments in the RecyclerView of DetailsActivity.
CommentAdapter.ViewHolder
ViewHolder class representing individual comment items in the RecyclerView
DetailsActivity
DetailsActivity displays details of a recipe, allows users to add live comments and ratings through an established WebSocket connection.
DiscoverActivity
DiscoverActivity serves allows users to discover and search for new recipes.
FavoritesActivity
FavoritesActivity displays a list of the user's favorite recipes.
Ingredient
 
IngredientApi
This interface defines the contract for interacting with the Ingredient API.
LambdaInterface<T>
The LambdaInterface is a functional interface that defines a single abstract method, doSomething, which takes a generic parameter and performs an action with it.
LoginActivity
LoginActivity provides a user interface for users to log in with their email and password.
LoginRequest
 
MainActivity
Initializes the MainActivity when it's created.
MyPantryActivity
This class represents the activity for managing pantry ingredients.
PantryIngredient
 
PantryIngredientApi
This interface defines the contract for interacting with the Pantry Ingredient API.
PickRecipeActivity
This class represents the activity for picking a recipe from the available recipes.
Post
 
Recipe
 
RecipeActivity
This class represents the activity for managing recipes.
RecipeApi
The RecipeApi interface defines a set of HTTP methods for interacting with a recipe-related API.
SignUpActivity
SignUpActivity provides a UI for users to register for KitchenMingle.
SlimCallback<T>
 
Users
 
UsersApi
The UsersApi interface defines a set of HTTP RESTful API endpoints for managing user-related operations.
WebSocketListener
Interface defining methods for handling WebSocket events.
WebSocketManager
Singleton WebSocketManager instance used for managing WebSocket connections in the Android application.
